blackengine.userInput

Class InputEngine<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.userInput.InputEngine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of action returned from the key mapper.

    public class InputEngine<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Engine singleton for input management. Can be used to retrieve the mouse event observable or action observable.

        public io.reactivex.Observable<MouseEvent> getMouseObservable()

        Returns:

      • setMouseGrabbed

        public void setMouseGrabbed(boolean value)
        Makes the cursor invisible and keeps it in its position. Mouse events act as though the mouse was not grabbed.
        Parameters:
        value - True if the cursor should be hidden, false otherwise.

      • isMouseGrabbed

        public boolean isMouseGrabbed()
        Retrieves whether the cursor is hidden or not.
        Returns:
        True if the cursor is hidden, false otherwise.
